review_en: Bokwang-dong Hill Village near the mosque is a wonderful place where time has stopped. On the first day of the Lunar New Year holiday, I went to Itaewon with my friends and decided to look around the mosque and took a walk in Bokwang-dong, a village on the hill. The Han River and the night view of Seoul overlooks the old alleys, and the alleys that are hard to see now remain intact. In between, small and cool shops and restaurants in India, Malaysia, Egypt, Turkey, and other countries are holding their seats. It's too good for an exotic walk.

review: 이태원역에 위치하고 있는 이태원. 외국인들이 많이 방문하고 지내는곳입니다. 세계다양한 음식들을 접할수 있어 좋은곳입니다.
review_en: Itaewon located at Itaewon Station. It is a place where many foreigners visit. It is a good place to get access to various foods around the world.

review: 몇년사이 이태원 역 근처는 이제 주 손님들이 내국인들을 겨냥한 곳들로 빠르게 바뀌고 있습니다. 서양식당들이 부대찌게 식당으로 바뀌고 있죠. 하지만 보광동쪽으로 조금만 걸어나가면 아직도 이국적인 식당들이 많습니다. 특히 이슬람사원을 중심으로 중동음식, 말레이지아등 이슬람 할랄음식등을 파는 곳들을 추천합니다.
review_en: Over the years, the area near Itaewon Station is now rapidly changing to places where the main guests are targeting Koreans. Western restaurants are turning into budaejjigae restaurants. However, if you walk a little bit towards Bokwang-dong, there are still many exotic restaurants. Especially, I recommend places that sell Islamic halal food such as Middle East food and Malaysia.

review: 전에 살던 동네라 리뷰를 써야 하는게 애매하다. 미군이 나가면서 황폐해질 줄 알았지만 외국인 상인들은 그대로 남으며 의외로 호황. 현지 음식들을 그대로 느낄 수 있어서 좋다. 이태원에는 유독 야생고양이들이 많다. 살던 외국인들이 두고 간 괭이들이 야생화되었다. 녀석들이 구석으로 다니고 사람에게 해를 끼치진 않으나 그래도 너무 어린 아이들은 혼자 두지 않는게 좋다. 남산에서 이곳저곳으로 연결된 산책로는 시간날 때 걸어보아야 한다. 패스트파이브는 시간 내어서라도 들러보아야할 맛있는 빵집이다.
review_en: It's ambiguous to write a review because it's my old neighborhood. The U.S. military was expected to be devastated, but foreign merchants remained the same and unexpectedly boomed. It's good to be able to feel local food as it is. There are many wild cats in Itaewon. The hoe left by the foreigners who lived has become wild. They don't go to the corner and hurt people, but it's better not to leave children too young alone. You should walk along the trail that connects Namsan Mountain from place to place when you have time. Fast Five is a delicious bakery to visit even if you have time.
